name: EDP Lisbon Marathon
notes: Health issues, had no training the entire year.
Run about 2/3 and walked about 1/3 of the distance.
Feet blistered, barely walking, 1 month to recover just walking.

name: Split Marathon
notes: Had about 6 weeks training until health crashed for the next 6 weeks prior to event.
Less than half the calories/gels of previous run, need to increase.
Much better electrolytes but need to increase.
Run almost the entire distance, but slowly with some walking at the end.
Quick partial recovery, felt ok within 1 week but need more time.
